body_content.explanation: an unusual growth on an animal or one of its organs, or on a plant:
examples: Adult males sometimes have a strange excrescence on the tip of their snouts.
No nodular excrescences were seen in any of the outer segments.
The excrescences were studied and were not associated with cerebrovascular disease.
He had an excrescency in the shape of a rose on his left foot.

body_content.explanation: something considered to be very ugly:
examples: The new office development is an excrescence on the face of the city.
